title: Did not get 2nd chest
body:
Hi
I recieved my hextech premium chest that contains orange essence plus ward skin and a champion skin
i heard that there is 1 more chest you can get by getting lvl 5 that contains ashe and garen skin shards
i am lvl 11 atm been plaiyng 3 days and havent recieved it yet
sorry for bad english

replies.body: Straaaaange you should have had that chest by now. Sometimes it can take a little bit for them to be added, but do me a favor and check again really quick!
